sentences.sContent: a mobile shop/library (= one inside a vehicle)
...mobile robots have been programmed to keep a comfortable distance from humans...
...Maria McCartney has been in the mobile ice-cream business since 2005...
...and in new business models for pricing and distributing music and mobile software online...
...I have trouble concentrating when my roommate talks so loud on her mobile phone...
...older people are also more likely to own their own homes and be less mobile than renters...
...often using Web-connected mobile devices they carry everywhere...
...70 million Asians are expected to be watching videos and TV programs on mobile phones...
...the split in our economy is really between two other classes: the mobile and immobile...
...The mobile phone is a magic device widely used these days...

exam.question: In order to make things convenient for the people, the department is planning to set up some _____ shops in the residential area.

answer.explain: 句意： 为了方便民众， 部里计划在居民区设立一些流动商店。flowing： 流动的； 平滑的； drifting： 漂流的； unstable： 不牢固的。

synos.tran: [生物]机动的；易变的，；非固定的
